title: The God Problem
description:
Kevin Allison shares two faith-shaking stories about grappling with angels and demons in his very Catholic youth.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (LeeDM101, Kevin Allison, Ramona Falls)
